sentences.english: Also, he spent his spare time guest-lecturing at University of Science and Technology.

sentences.english: Lio Beardsley graduated from the hk Polytechnic University with a degree in photography and is currently working as a freelance illustrator.

sentences.english: I am now studying the Electronic and IT Master Course in the HK Poly U.
